newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Goldtron Holdings places 31 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Goldtron Holdings places 31 mln shares.

text.p: Video cassettes maker Goldtron Holdings Ltd said on Friday it had agreed to place 31 million new shares, or about nine percent of the company's enlarged share capital, at HK$0.46 each to independent investors.
The company said the shareholding of its controlling shareholder Goldtron Ltd would be diluted to 66.88 percent from 73.55 percent on completion of the deal on June 27.
The net proceeds of about HK$13.9 million will be used for working capital, it said. Shares of Goldtron Holdings ended at HK$0.48 each on Thursday.
